original_text: The Lord says, ‘They started to do evil things at Gilgal. 9: Gilgal was across the Jordan River from the god, Baal-Peor. It was an important place where people worshipped other gods. See Amos 4:4; 5:5. It was there that I began to hate them. Because they do evil things, I will chase them out of my land. I will not love them any more. Their leaders have all turned against me. korean_text: 그들의 모든 악이 길갈에 있으므로 내가 거기에서 그들을 미워하였노라 그들의 행위가 악하므로 내 집에서 그들을 쫓아내고 다시는 사랑하지 아니하리라 그들의 지도자들은 다 반역한 자니라

sentences.original_text: They started to do evil things at Gilgal.
Gilgal was across the Jordan River
It was there that I began to hate them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 미워하기 시작한 것은 바로 그곳이었다.

sentences.original_text: I will chase them out of my land.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 내 땅에서 쫓아낼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will not love them any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 그들을 사랑하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Their leaders have all turned against me.
